General.Name: China Security & Fire Co Ltd Class A
General.Description: China Security Co., Ltd. designs and sells security services in China and internationally. It provides cash logistics management, property security, electronic security, guard security, facility management, and extended security services. Further, it offers smart transportation, hospital, campus, and buildings; network security; and public security. The company was formerly known as China Security & Fire Co.,Ltd and changed its name to China Security Co., Ltd. in May 2018. China Security Co., Ltd. was founded in 1987 and is based in Shanghai, China.

6.Name: Mr. Zhao  Ming
6.Title: Admin. Head of the Financial Planning Department & Fund Operating Department
